title: San Francisco SPCA brings mobile vaccine clinic to Stockton
body_text:
San Francisco SPCA brings mobile vaccine clinic to Stockton
The mobile vaccine clinic took place from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m. at the San Joaquin County Fairgrounds on Saturday.

San Francisco SPCA brings mobile vaccine clinic to Stockton
The mobile vaccine clinic took place from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m. at the San Joaquin County Fairgrounds on Saturday.
Updated: 2:06 PM PST Feb 6, 2024
Editorial Standards ⓘ
Dog owners in the Stockton area were able to get their dogs vaccinated for free over the weekend. The mobile vaccine clinic took place from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m. at the San Joaquin County Fairgrounds on Saturday. For more information, watch the video above.
